entry_trigger: Enter on break + hold above opening range high (ORH). Confirm with RVOL > 1.5× and price holding above VWAP. Alternative: VWAP reclaim if initial dip holds above premarket low.
invalidation: Close below VWAP after entry. Fill of entire premarket gap. Price below opening range low (ORL) on increasing volume.
exit_plan: Scale ⅓ at +1R. Move stop to break-even. Scale ⅓ at +1.5R or ATR target. Trail final ⅓ with ATR×1.5 trailing stop.

entry_trigger: No trade: conditions do not meet playbook criteria.

playbook_reason: Gap Fade: gap=7.0%, weak tape=0.43, breadth=0%
entry_trigger: Short on failed break / VWAP rejection / lower high pattern. Confirm: gap fading with declining RVOL, bearish tape, bid dropping. Entry below VWAP on second rejection with volume.
invalidation: New HOD above entry / ORH breakout with volume. VWAP reclaim + hold after entry (for short fade).
exit_plan: Scale ½ at VWAP (mean reversion target). Scale ½ at previous close or +1R. Hard stop — no averaging down on fade trades.

entry_trigger: Enter after initial noise settles (15–60 min post-news). Wait for trend confirmation: higher lows for long, lower highs for short. Use VWAP + ATR levels for entry zone. Swing hold 1–3 days.
invalidation: Reversal of drift direction: higher low broken (long) or lower high broken (short). Return to pre-news price level (full retracement).
exit_plan: Hold for 1–3 days. Scale ⅓ at next resistance/support. Trail stop with daily ATR×1.5. Exit fully if drift stalls (volume drying up).
